channel.title: Webclient. error connecting
channel.description:
hey. i've just made a new webclient, everything works fine. except connecting to my server. it downloaded the cache, and extracted it just fine. background and sprites are loaded. it just cant connect as if the server is offline, but it is'nt. in my server shell it doesnt show my client trying to connect. so it probally has something to do with server ip defined.
my old webclient works, its just out of date, thus i made a new one today.
anyone able to help? thanks.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2009, 10:18:57 pm[/size][hr]odd.. it connects to localhost instead of the ip i stated. if i run a rs server on my pc and go to my webclient, it's able to connect to the server i have running on my pc. anyone?

item.title: Webclient. error connecting
item.dc:creator: @killer117 killer117
item.description:
@killer117 wrote:

Oh I see, but what I don’t know how to do is change it to not get it from the .getlocalhost in the client.class :s
I’ll try look around and see.

-Thanks!

Hmm, well I found it, but I don’t know how to change it. :\

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient. error connecting
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

i discovered why its unable to connect, and was able to solve it.

Killer117 you should try following the steps in the how to make a server changer tutorial.

the reason my client was unable to connect is:

normally the client loads its config from gui.class or client.class
and if its launched from a website it changes to the .getlocalhost method in client.class

Read full topic
